title: Girlfriend
desc: The air-headed redheaded deuteragonist, Girlfriend! Being forced to be a homebody for most of her life, she loves exploring and getting out of the house, made easy thanks to both her and BF's rich families. Always sticking by BF's side wherever he takes her. They never really seem to realize they're in danger until its too late, though.

cData.desc: Scrapped Playable GF Dodge Poses Concept by FifLeo
Scrapped Playable GF Death Concept by FifLeo
Old GF key art by EllisBros
Old Concept for Whitty GF by Offbi (The idea originally was a Skatepark)
